jstarcraft.gui.ui
类 StarComboBoxUI

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.plaf.ComponentUI
      javax.swing.plaf.ComboBoxUI
          javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicComboBoxUI
              jstarcraft.gui.ui.StarComboBoxUI

public class StarComboBoxUI
extends javax.swing.plaf.basic.BasicComboBoxUI

扩展默认的ComboBox的UI外观 更改ArrowButton的样式，创建自定义的StarComboPopup

作者：
jiangyp
